missed_details.description: INMUN1→DEHAM 40ft container avg freight $1,800. This shipment shows $7,200 — exactly 4x the average.
missed_details.why_this_matters: Inflated freight = inflated CIF value = lower import duty for buyer OR kickback to freight forwarder. Margin loss: $5,400 per shipment.

missed_details.description: UAE (Gulf Distributors LLC) October 2025 shows single shipment of 95,000 units Basmati Rice ($114,000) — far above monthly UAE average.
missed_details.why_this_matters: Could indicate stockpiling before embargo, re-export to sanctioned countries (Iran, nearby), or fraudulent invoicing.

false_positive_details.why_flagged: African Goods Co paid in 138 days — 4.8σ above their avg of 52 days.
false_positive_details.why_its_actually_fine: Flagged by statistical model as outlier but within acceptable variance for this product/route combination.
